name: Expense Manager
description: My first project made in my bootcamp to track daily expenses that consist of 5 pages and a REST API with JWT auth and Cloudinary storage, both frontend & backend deployed to my personal VPS with CI/CD from Github Actions
techs: React, React Router, ANT Design, Node+Express, PostgreSQL, Jest, JWT auth, Cloudinary, Nginx

name: Cafe Point of Sales
description: App to process payments and log transactions that consist of 1 page and a REST API , both frontend & backend deployed to my personal VPS. I learnt a lot about UI / CSS framework here
techs: React, Material UI, Node+Express, Swagger, MySQL, Vitest, Nginx

name: Task Memo
description: Simple app to record daily task to-do with complete validation and clean code, both all deployed to my personal VPS. My most simple yet most comprehensive project
techs: React, Bootstrap, Node+Express, MySQL, Jest, Swagger
